title: Movement along PPC illustrates opportunty cost

content.prompt: The concept of opportunity cost is best represented by which of the following?

choices.label: A shift from PPC1 to PPC2
A movement from point A to point D
A movement from point B to point C
A movement from point C to point E
A movement from point D to point B

topic.text: 1.2: Opportunity Cost and the Production Possibilities Curve (PPC)
